    foo ? foo_result :

```
let abc s =
    if s = "" then
        "hello"
    else
        "world"

abc "" |> stdout.WriteLine
// hello
```

```
try
  throw foo
catch /aaa/
  return a_result
catch /bbb/
  return b_result
catch /ccc/
  return c_result
endtry
return other
```
